releaseNotes:
1.3.34
* code generated
* reading multi-value references in UpdateObjectFromPersistentValues() avoided
1.3.33
* RuntimeSettings: create database if connection cannot be assured
1.3.32
* Entity: touch administrations in AssureUsable()
* AdministrationOfEntities: local cache for entities removed
* code generated
1.3.31
* Attribute: call to AssureUptoDate() moved from UpdateObjectFromPersistentValues() to property getter
1.3.30
* Object: FirstObjectByValueLike() used in CurrentUser() and CurrentUserId
1.3.29
* BootstrapAttribute: attribute Transient supported
1.3.28
* Object: InsertIntoDatabase() includes Refresh()
* Object: completed implementations completed (still inactive)
* Entity: bugfix in IsUserObject()
* Object: Touch() includes Refresh()
1.3.27
* preparations for nested invokations of amendedWorker and writeToDatabaseWorker
1.3.26
* Object: using SqlDbType.VarBinary for writing BytesValue
1.3.25
* overloads of RunExclusiveObjectTask() added
* objects from model database are not written into database
* SqlDbType -> DbType
1.3.24
* Object: OnAmended() calls refreshDynamicValuesNoWaiting() always
1.3.23
* Database: call LogDuration() with sql
* Attribute: code generator uses AssignValueQuietly() and RunExclusiveObjectTask()
* Object: WriteToDatabase() does not refresh dynamic values anymore
* Object: AssureExclusiveTask() has a quick exit
* Object: Check() uses a time diff of more than 100ms
1.3.22
* AssureUser: do not create empty user; when duplicates exist, use oldest entry
1.3.21
* refreshDynamicValuesNoWaiting() introduced
1.3.20
* check if object is amended before WriteToDatabase() in BackgroundWorker
* exclusive tasks introduced
* code generator using RunExclusiveObjectTask() implemented
1.3.19
* ObjectService: additional check for key after crating object
1.3.18
* AdministrationOfEntities: GetEntities() and GetUserMessage() implemented
* SQLite dependent packages added
1.3.17
* packages updated
1.3.16
* FormViewWidget: take suggested value for UseAdditionalWidth and UseAdditionalHeight
1.3.15
* TableView: introducing GenerateColumns()
1.3.14
* UpdateObjectInDatabase made public and non virtual
* no message after GenerateSourceCode()
* generate model database file into test project folder
1.3.13
* ReadFromDatabase includes call to RefreshDynamicValues()
1.3.12
* removed logging
1.3.11
* log connection string for sqlite
1.3.10
* Microsoft.Data.Sqlite replaced by System.Data.SQLite
1.3.9
* remove suffix from product name
1.3.8
* remove suffix from product name
1.3.5
* code generation: show error message when an attribute is incomplete
* FormView, FormViewWidget: show message when no behavior is generated
1.3.4
* ApplySettings throws exceptions when it fails
* support for SQLite
* Object: usage of "top 1" removed
* Database: hard-coded setting for connection timeout removed;
* Database: data types integer and image added;
* Database: unused code removed
* RuntimeSettings: introducing ApplyModelDatabaseSettings() and ApplyUserDatabaseSettings()
* RuntimeSettings: introducing ApplyCodingSettings()
* FileValue: avoid call to ObjectById() when setting null
* GenerateSourceCode() also generates database file
* copy model database file into blazor project folder
* copy model database file into service project folder
* SqlFactory: check for database type ignoring case
* RuntimeSettings: AutoSave defaults to true
* Object: introducing CopyValuesFrom()
* Object: CopyValuesFrom() does not make object dirty
* CreateRowInDatabase() supports SQLite and SQL-Server;
* Object: introducing GetValueByAttributePath()
* RuntimeSettings: introducing InitModelDatabase() without parameter
* RuntimeSettings: introducing ApplyModelDatabaseSettings() with byte array
* RuntimeSettings: introducing ApplyUserDatabaseSettings() with string parameters
title: de.horaios.Charis.Objects
